item.title: 10 Mac Applications for your Christmas List
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
10 Mac Applications for your Christmas List
Here is a list of FREE software that I use everyday, or at least once a week. This year for Christmas I decided to donate some of my gift money to the mac software that I did not have to buy or that was open source. These authors or groups of these applications give their time and energy to make great software for all of us.
